18#ifndef _LVM_STRING_H
19#define _LVM_STRING_H
20
21#include <stdio.h>
22#include <stdarg.h>
23
24#define NAME_LEN 128
25
26struct pool;
27
28int emit_to_buffer(char **buffer, size_t *size, const char *fmt, ...)
29 __attribute__ ((format(printf, 3, 4)));
30
31char *build_dm_name(struct dm_pool *mem, const char *vg,
32 const char *lv, const char *layer);
33
34int validate_name(const char *n);
35
36/*
37 * Returns number of occurrences of c in first len characters of str.
38 */
39unsigned count_chars(const char *str, size_t len, const int c);
40
41/*
42 * Returns what length of escaped string would be including terminating NUL.
43 */
44size_t escaped_len(const char *str);
45
46/*
47 * Copies a string from src to out.
48 * Double quotation marks and backslashes are quoted with a backslash.
49 * Caller must ensure *out has enough space - see escaped_len().
50 * Returns *out.
51 */
52char *escape_double_quotes(char *out, const char *src);
53
54/*
55 * Removes quoting of double quotation marks and backslashes in situ.
56 */
57void unescape_double_quotes(char *src);
58
59#endif
60
